title: it's worth for a 14 day susspension?

one player who destroys the game still i'm the bad one.
so riot please fix ur community and watch carefully the games and how they are going.thanks for the biggest surprise ever before the preseason.
idk why i'm sending reports to help this community and never works still thinking i could solve something.a big part of the chat is not about game is just about his miserable chat not with me but still with all another 4 of us tilting anyone.so please be kind and do something
Have a great day everyone.

replies.body:
I actually dont think that was deserved to be honest.

you were being a bit of a pain in the arse but if you were in my game I'd just mute you. That is what the mute button is for.

no racism, sexism, bigotry, hate speech. Just a teenager being a whiney little dick. Riot may as well ban 90% right now of the population if that is the criteria.
